ovdesc.p: This file specifies various parameters required for local Central Bank processing.

desc.p: This field is reserved for future expansion.
This is a NOINPUT field.
This field specifies the position of the LOCAL REFERENCE field specified in LOC.REF.DESC on the LOCAL.REF.TABLE file for the application defined in field APPLICATION.
1 - 3 numeric characters. Associated subvalue field. (Mandatory input).
This field is reserved for future expansion.
This is a NOINPUT field.
This field is reserved for future expansion.
This is a NOINPUT field.
This field specifies the key to the record.
If for example the country for which local Central Bank processing is to take place is Luxembourg then the input to this field should be 'IBLC'.
1 - 8 alphanumeric (type A) characters. (Mandatory Input).
This field is reserved for future expansion.
This is a NOINPUT field.
This field specifies the name of the LOCAL REFERENCE field required for the application defined in field APPLICATION.
1 - 35 alphanumeric characters. Associated subvalue field. (Mandatory input).
This field is reserved for future expansion.
This is a NOINPUT field.
This field is reserved for future expansion.
This is a NOINPUT field.
This field defines the application for which local Central Bank processing is to take place.
If for example the LOCAL PROCESS CODE is 'IBLC' then the input to this field should be four multivalues consisting of 'FUNDS.TRANSFER', 'DRAWINGS', 'TELLER' and 'DATA.CAPTURE'.
1 - 35 characters. The input must be a valid entry on the PGM.FILE. Associated multivalue field. (Mandatory input).
This fields specifies the name of the routine which will be used to check the input for the local Central Bank processing.
If for example the LOCAL PROCESS CODE is 'IBLC' then the input to this field must be 'IBLC.CHECK'.
1 - 35 characters. The input must be a valid entry on the PGM.FILE as type 'S'. Associated multivalue field. (Mandatory input).
This field is used to describe the local Central Bank processing defined in LOCAL.PROCESS.CODE.
3 - 35 alphanumeric (tyoe A) characters. Multilanguage field. (Mandatory input).
This field specifies the name of the routine which will be used to initialise the various parameters and common variables for the local Central Bank processing.
If for example the LOCAL PROCESS CODE is 'IBLC' then the input to this field must be 'IBLC.INIT'.
1 - 35 characters. The input must be a valid entry on the PGM.FILE as type 'S'. Associated multivalue field. (Mandatory input).
